Title: The 3 July and 24 July proclamations are Chairman Mao's great strategic plans! Unite with forces that can be united with to strike surely, accurately and relentlessly at the handful of class enemies
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 3 and 24 July proclamations or bulletins were issued by the Party, in the name of Mao, and called for an end to the violence between the different factions in the Cultural Revolution, and for the return of weapons seized from the PLA. The proclamations are depicted in the poster, the white sheets with red characters held high above the crowd.
